price: Ènìyàn àti àlùjànnú kan kò fọwọ́ kàn wọ́n rí ṣíwájú wọn.
arabic: لَمۡ يَطۡمِثۡهُنَّ إِنسٞ قَبۡلَهُمۡ وَلَا جَآنّٞ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: lam yaṭmith'hunna insun qablahum walā jānnun
